results.content:
Don't know where to begin? Check out [hashcat](https://resources.infosecinstitute.com/topic/hashcat-tutorial-beginners/) for a step-by-step tutorial on cracking passwords. 

All of these hashes can be cracked with the [rockyou.txt](https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&ved=2ahUKEwiFjaSS3Yf0AhUQTN8KHT-ZC2AQFnoECAUQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fbrannondorsey%2Fnaive-hashcat%2Freleases%2Fdownload%2Fdata%2Frockyou.txt&usg=AOvVaw3snAERl1mU6Ccr4WFEazBd) wordlist.
Use the two provided wordlists in a combinator attack with [hashcat](https://www.4armed.com/blog/hashcat-combinator-attack/).
DNS servers receive requests over port 53.
When I need an extra boost, I get up and grab a coffee at my favorite cafe!
